heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover the path to your true self.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us in one of our upcoming encounters with the sacred medicine.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony's details.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is the key to a transformative experience. Discover our recommendations for diet, mind, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay connected with our community, receive updates on future events, and share the journey of healing.
guidesPageSubtitle: We are a family dedicated to holding and accompanying with love, respect, and deep commitment on this path of healing.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's name, description, and image.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the guide.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine originating from the Amazon, prepared by combining two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna plant (Psychotria viridis). This combination creates a powerful visionary and purifying brew that has been used for centuries for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a deep level, cleansing the body of toxins and freeing the mind from limiting patterns. Participants often experience visions and deep emotional releases that reveal the root of their suffering, allowing for profound understanding and reconciliation with their past.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than just a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a master plant, a conscious spirit that guides each person on a unique and personal journey of self-discovery. Each ceremony is an opportunity to receive its wisdom and love.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of purpose and a clearer understanding of their path in life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release of trauma, resolution of internal conflicts, and healing of deep emotional wounds.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: A profound sense of connection with oneself, with others, and with the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Healing in community, where the energy of the group enhances the individual experience.
privateCeremonyDescription: A more intimate and personalized process, focused on your specific intentions.
preparationProcessDescription: The first step is to prepare your body and mind. A clean diet and a clear intention are fundamental.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where, guided by sound and songs, you connect with the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep inner journey of visions, emotions, and revelations for your healing.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you understand and apply the teachings received in your daily life.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before the ceremony, it's crucial to purify your body.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mindset is as important as your diet.
meditationDescription: Practice meditation to calm the mind and be more receptive.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. What is your purpose for this ceremony?
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to write down your thoughts and feelings before and after.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional process. It is a journey into your inner self, where you may confront fears, sorrows, and blockades that you have carried for years. It is an act of courage and a gift of love to yourself. Allow yourself to feel, to release, and to cry. Every tear is a river that cleanses your soul. We will be there to support you with love and respect at every moment.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Come prepared to be comfortable and focused.
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the next day.
An open heart and a willingness to surrender.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Adjust the application's color palette (dark mode only).
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and receive guidance.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome! I am your Spiritual Guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.

allUsersDescription: Here is a list of all registered users.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to fill out the health questionnaire to continue with your process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: [LINK]
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to the health questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire has been submitted by this user yet.
questionnaireDescription: Your answers are confidential and essential for us to provide you with a safe and profound experience. Please answer with complete honesty.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescribed medication (especially antidepressants or anxiolytics)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please specify which ones:
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of psychiatric conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or with other master plants before?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your experience:
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you seek to heal, understand, or explore...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing your information.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed an essential step in your journey. We now invite you to review the preparation guide to get ready for your experience.
tourWelcomeDescription: To start your journey, let's take a quick tour of the site. First, please provide your phone number to stay in touch.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will use this number to send important notifications.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and testimonials from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our next scheduled ceremonies. Click on one to see the details.
tourStepFinal: Thank you for joining us. The next step is to fill out your health questionnaire to ensure a safe experience.

exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its origins, and its healing power.
exploreCeremoniesDescription: Discover our upcoming ceremonies and find the right one for you.
